outcomes.name: Thumbspark Jelly
outcomes.description: Thimble-sized flask. Glows orange. Rub it on your thumb and finger, then snap. Little burst of flame, like a match. Works ten times on any reasonably high-friction joint.

outcomes.name: Findernails
outcomes.description: Black pot of nail polish. Ten uses. Can look through nail like a screen to dimly see ghosts and invisible things for 1hr. Only works on fingernails for some reason.

outcomes.name: Ingenious Snuff Box
outcomes.description: In the shape of a swan with moving wings, a tiger with glowing eyes, a cube with five sides, etc. Fashionable but cheaply made (just silver plated).

outcomes.name: Sleeping Pillow
outcomes.description: Sew a lock of hair into a special compartment. When the hair’s owner’s head touches the pillow, if they are at all tired, they fall asleep for 8 restful hours.

outcomes.name: Crabshoes
outcomes.description: Allow the wearer to run in any direction as fast as they could run forward.

outcomes.name: Doctor Spack’s Potency Powder
outcomes.description: Fine grey dust in a glass vial. Sprinkle on a body part (traditionally a private one) to make it appear more appealing for 1d6 hours. Purely visual.

outcomes.name: Wig-in-a-Can
outcomes.description: 1" wide 2" long can produces a full-sized powdered wig. Takes 2hrs to stuff the wig back inside. Lawyers keep one for emergencies.

outcomes.name: Deflective Bumbershoot
outcomes.description: Magic umbrella. Pole with a disc of force at the top. Stops rain. Some versions can turn it into steam or snow, or direct it at passers-by.

outcomes.name: Commemorative Medallion
outcomes.description: Brass, highly polished, cheap ribbon. When pressed, speaks the name of the event in an authoritative tone. Available for all occasions.

outcomes.name: Chromic Silk
outcomes.description: Used for cravats, hatbands, ribbons, and tights. Changes colour randomly, like an oil slick. Fascinating for about a minute, then very tacky.

outcomes.name: Autoscribe
outcomes.description: Glass and silver pen with an ink reservoir. When activated, will transcribe speech in any language for 1d6 hours. Spelling and punctuation are wildly inventive to say the least.

outcomes.name: Indestructible Hat
outcomes.description: Bowlers common; flat caps available. Hat can be folded, punctured, or shredded and still regenerate in minutes. Cannot survive fire, acid, or magic.

outcomes.name: Pocket Ice
outcomes.description: Pocketwatch-sized metal canister. Can be opened to produce one ice cube. Refills in one hour in damp conditions. May require additional water.

outcomes.name: Bullet Charm
outcomes.description: Activates at a loud sound, so only useful for subsonic muskets and pistols. Has a 1-in-6 chance of deflecting a shot (sold as 'guaranteed'). One use, can only wear one.

outcomes.name: Longpocket
outcomes.description: Up to 1" long by 1" wide by 20" deep (can be tailored). Useful for canes, other long thin items. Anything in the pocket still has weight. Liquid can soak through the fabric.

outcomes.name: Stiffening Wand
outcomes.description: Marble stick 4" long. Pass over a section of fabric to make it a hard as glass for 1 hr. Used to make impossible dresses reveal just the right amount.

outcomes.name: Sweetheart’s Bell
outcomes.description: Small brass bell. Only the ringer and people who have previously touched the bell at the same time as the ringer while making eye contact can hear it. 50' range.

outcomes.name: Folding Bicycle
outcomes.description: Fits into a 2" by 4" tin. Enchanted paper, so it falls apart after a 1d6 days, or 1d6 minutes if driven in rain or fog.

outcomes.name: Personal Lock
outcomes.description: Iron padlock with no keyhole. Only opens for the person who first fed it a drop of blood. A crowbar will also work.

outcomes.name: Recorker
outcomes.description: Wooden wand that inserts a cork into open wine bottles or any other similarly sized hole. 30 uses. Corking a person’s nostril or ear inflicts 1 damage.
